import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button'; import Modal from 'react-bootstrap/Modal' import Layout from '../Templates/Layout'; import { selectUser } from '../redux/slices/userSlice'; import HomePageLanding from './HomePageLanding'; // Icons made by srip from www.flaticon.com const HomePage = () => { const [difficulty, setDifficulty] = useState(''); const [show, setShow] = useState(false); const handleClose = () => setShow(false); const handleShow = () => setShow(true); const user = useSelector(selectUser); return ( {user ? (

Welcome, {user.nickname}

We hope you will have a fulfilling experience with PeerPrep today!

ELO: xxxx

Your current rank is

You are xxxx points away from the next rank. Keep it up!

) : ( )} ); }; export default HomePage;
